name: Epic Space: Online
detailed_description:
Updated June 2017

Epic Space: Online is a massively multiplayer combat sandbox. Pilots join one of two factions in a never ending war over resources across the galaxy. Destroy Outposts, NPCs, and engage in tense ship to ship combat all in One Shared Universe.

  • One Server, Shared by All
  • Missions, Mining, Trading, Crafting
  • Combat / PVP
  • Monthly Updates
  • First Person or Third Person Flight with Joystick Support

Innovative Voice Communication

Specialized Voice Communication System allowing an unlimited amount of players to communicate effectively in space. But be careful, once you broadcast, even your enemies know where you are.

Completely Redesigned Experience

With the help of player feedback, we've completely re-tailored the experience. Better tutorial missions, elimination of fuel, voice acting, and a better chat system are just some of the few things we've done to make the game better.

No Insurance Needed

Blowing **** up comes first, you'll never regret losing a ship or loot on a mission. But instead, be driven to hone your skills and try again. There's always something to shoot down... and it probably deserved it anyway!

short_description: Epic Space is a Third Person Action MMO featuring unique voice communication, emergent gameplay, and twitch-based combat on a single shard. There is one persistent sandbox/universe, shared by the entire world. Players earn reputations for completing orders, securing objectives, recon and team play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

  • Storage: 1 GB available space
